attributes.action: Increase the amount of benefit,paid to family carers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increase the amount of benefit paid to people who have to give up work to look after members of their family.
     I have had to give up work to look after my mother,this is a 24/7 commitment for which I think I deserve more than £48.65 that is paid as carers allowance.
      As anyone in this situation knows this involves the cooking the cleaning ,shopping,washing,the trips to hospital (three per week minimum)the restless sleep incase she falls out of bed and the list goes on.
      It seems you get thought of better for doing nothing.
